pkgmetadata.longdescription: Panda3D is an Open Source game engine, a framework for 3D rendering and game development for Python and C++ programs.

use.flag: Enables support for augmented reality through package media-libs/artoolkit
Enables physics support through package sci-physics/bullet, a collision detection and physics library
Enables optimised linear algebra library through package dev-cpp/eigen
Builts the PStats viewer for graphical analysis of real-time performance
Uses EGL instead of default GLX to manage OpenGL
Enables physics support through package Open Dynamics Engine SDK dev-games/ode
Adds support for OpenGL in bitmaps using libOSMesa from media-libs/mesa
Adds support for nVidia's CG shaders through media-gfx/nvidia-cg-toolkit
Enables OpenGL GLESv1 backend for acceleration
Enables OpenGL GLESv2 backend for acceleration
Enables Netscape plugin API (a set of interfaces to write browser plugins) through net-misc/npapi-sdk
Enables support for DXT1, DXT3, DXT5 pre-compressed texture images through package
